basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The [Delinea](https://delinea.com/) Secret Server Microsoft Sentinel Data Solution enables delivery of Delinea Secret Server log messages to your Microsoft Sentinel Workspace. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Common Event Format (CEF) formatted logs in Microsoft Sentinel](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-common-event-format) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This solution installs the data connector for ingesting Delinea Secret Server Audit, Sign-in, Provisioning, Risk Events and Risky User/Service Principal logs using Diagnostic Settings. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: The workbook installed with the Delinea solution will provide insights into vault activity, secrets that will soon expire, and secrets that have expired. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
